column2: You're a skeleton of a person at this point when your jailor enters into your cell. You sniff that delicious chicken drumstick in his hand as he rips into it, muttering between bites, "Oi. Get out o' here." You ask if you can have the leg and he promptly slaps you across the face. Ouch.
